Name: project_budget_limit
Description: The total project cost must not exceed the budget

Name: sprint_goal_achieved
Description: The sprint goal must be achieved

Name: team_cross_functional
Description: The team must have all required roles covered

Name: worker_availability_min
Description: Each worker must have at least 80% availability

Name: feature_priority_high
Description: Critical features must have a priority above a threshold

Name: story_points_per_sprint
Description: The total story points per sprint must not exceed team velocity

Name: no_severe_blockers
Description: No active blocker with severity above 'High' is allowed

Name: task_status_done
Description: All tasks in the sprint backlog must be 'Done' by the end

Name: snapshot_test_passed
Description: The development snapshot must have a 'Passed' test status

Name: review_attendance
Description: Key stakeholders must attend the sprint review
